#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    int n,k,count=0,i,ans;
        scanf("%d",&n);
	    int a[501]={0};
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    {
	        scanf("%d",&k);
	        a[k]++;
	    }
	    for(i=500;i>=0;i--)
	    {
	        if(a[i]>count)
	        {
	            count=a[i];
	            ans=i;
	        }
	    }
	    printf("%d %d\n",ans,count);
	    
	   
	}
	
	return 0;
}
